name: Marble Rush (Groupe 4 - Cimeart)
description:
This game was produced during a Game Jam within 36 hours. This year's subject was "less than 60 seconds". So we decided with our team to create a game which takes the principle of flipper.  We want you to have fun in a retro world and play a new version of the flipper to test your speed. 

The team 

Game Dev : 

Alexandre GOMEZ

Julien CABROL 

Game Art :

Guillaume FAELENS 

Abigaïl ROSA

Antoine PEYRARD
